SEARCH:
模块 com.example.demo
程序包 com.example.demo.controller

类 Control_Control

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.controller.Control_Control
public class Control_Control extends Object
The Control_Control class is responsible for managing the control panel in the game. It handles the setup of UI elements such as images, buttons, and resizing them. It also manages the closing of the control panel and cleaning up resources.

  • 字段概要

    ammoboxImageView
    The image representing an ammo box, which may be collected for power-ups or replenishment in the game.

    addHoverSoundToButton(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
    Adds a hover sound effect to a given button.
    private void
    clearImageView(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView)
    Clears the image of the given ImageView.
    private void
    closeControl()
    Closes the control panel, removing the blur effect and the control pane from the main interface.
    void
    initialize()
    Initializes the control panel by setting up button hover sound, loading images, and setting the sizes of the UI elements.
    private void
    loadImages()
    Loads the images for the control panel elements (aircraft, bullets, heart, ammo box).
    void
    releaseResources()
    Releases resources used by the images in the control panel by clearing their references.
    private void
    setElementSizes()
    Sets the size of the image views for each control element.
    private void
    setImageViewSize(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, double width, double height)
    Sets the width and height for the given ImageView.
    void
    setMainRoot(javafx.scene.layout.Pane mainRoot)
    Sets the root container of the main interface to remove the blur effect when closing.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the control panel by setting up button hover sound, loading images, and setting the sizes of the UI elements.

    • addHoverSoundToButton

      private void addHoverSoundToButton(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Adds a hover sound effect to a given button.
      参数:
      button - The button to which the hover sound will be added.

    • loadImages

      private void loadImages()
      Loads the images for the control panel elements (aircraft, bullets, heart, ammo box).

    • setElementSizes

      private void setElementSizes()
      Sets the size of the image views for each control element.

    • setImageViewSize

      private void setImageViewSize(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, double width, double height)
      Sets the width and height for the given ImageView.
      参数:
      imageView - The ImageView whose size will be set.
      width - The width to set.
      height - The height to set.

    • setMainRoot

      public void setMainRoot(javafx.scene.layout.Pane mainRoot)
      Sets the root container of the main interface to remove the blur effect when closing.
      参数:
      mainRoot - The root container of the main interface.

    • closeControl

      private void closeControl()
      Closes the control panel, removing the blur effect and the control pane from the main interface.

    • releaseResources

      public void releaseResources()
      Releases resources used by the images in the control panel by clearing their references.

    • clearImageView

      private void clearImageView(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView)
      Clears the image of the given ImageView.
      参数:
      imageView - The ImageView whose image will be cleared.
